structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Reconciliation of two-year and four-year renewal periods.

text.section: A license to operate a motor vehicle, motorcycle, or moped shall be renewed every four (4) years during an applicant's birth month. A person seeking to renew an operator's license shall apply at the office of the circuit clerk in the county where he resides on a form furnished by the cabinet.
The fee to renew an operator's license shall be according to the schedule set forth in KRS 186.531.

law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 267, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
